Array.name: Tranquil Forest
Array.description: A silent forest shrouded in mist. What could have happened in this place untouched by human hands for so long?

Array.name: Novice Wizard's Alchemy Workshop
Array.description: My small alchemy workshop gradually taking shape amidst the endless care of nature

Array.name: Cleanup of Rabbit Mansion
Array.description: Sweeping away the dust and letting in the fresh breeze, I start the day with a new mindset!

Array.name: Exciting Secret Forest Exploration
Array.description: What secrets does this forest hide? Let's start from here!

Array.name: The Witch's Dream Shop
Array.description: A small shop filled with the dreams of an unnamed witch who lived here long ago.

Array.name: Sunflower Farm in the Deep Forest
Array.description: Dreams of dyeing everything beyond the horizon in beautiful gold, and a handful of seeds...

Array.name: Mysterious Magic Library
Array.description: A small magical library meticulously made to prevent the loss of collected knowledge

Array.name: Happy Halloween Party
Array.description: The moment you wake up from sleep, an amazing party you've never experienced will start!

Array.name: Devout Grass Worship Hall
Array.description: A chapel to praise the faith and blessings that deeply emanate from the heart

Array.name: Peaceful Snowflake's Wish
Array.description: The crystalline snowflakes gently falling are building up white and beautiful hopes

Array.name: Ocean of Shimmering Colors and Dreams
Array.description: The dazzlingly blue waves are depicting the shape of the dream they've longed for

Array.name: Exciting Magic Workshop
Array.description: What kind of miracle will overflow from the boiling pot?

Array.name: Living World of Herbalism
Array.description: Thought they were swayed by the wind, but the grasses... are moving?!

Array.name: Bold Rabbit Kingdom
Array.description: Captured the grandeur of the rabbit kingdom that will never set

Array.name: Mysterious World & Alice's Adventure
Array.description: What is this place...? A peculiar world chock-full of enigmatic tales yet to be unraveled!

Array.name: Echoes of Wandering Tunes
Array.description: In the quiet forest, a warm and gentle song, though still clumsy, softly echoes through the trees.

Array.name: Faithful Fairy and Small Temple
Array.description: A small temple that proves the existence of fairies' faith towards the goddess

Array.name: Elegant Song of the Swan
Array.description: A space where intricate decorations and elegance forming symmetry blend beautifully

Array.name: Journey to the Autumn Forest
Array.description: The fall forest exploration of crunchy red leaves and eager scout rabbits

Array.name: Minerva's Wizarding School
Array.description: Knowledge may weigh heavy on the shoulders, but hey, the more we learn, the higher we rise!

Array.name: Ducks' Quacking Outing
Array.description: A mixture of playful magic created a strange yet cute garden of ducks

Array.name: Eternal Blessing March
Array.description: A march of love that resonates at the moment that announces a new beginning that signals the end and the promise of eternity

Array.name: White Flowers, Romance, and Snails
Array.description: A quaint resting spot for red snails enjoying the pure beauty of nature

Array.name: Secrets of the Antique Mansion
Array.description: Elegant furniture and the faint glow of candles are hiding the secrets of this mansion.

Array.name: Mysterious Mansion of the Blue Butterfly
Array.description: Mysterious mansion where blue waves soar. The owner of this place wishes to invite you.

Array.name: Castle Under the Rising Red Moon
Array.description: Eternal darkness that never dims and a red moon are unfolding with a sinister laugh.

Array.name: Bustling Toy Town
Array.description: The soft pastel tone is enveloping this bustling town with warmth.

Array.name: Deep Sea of Waving Light
Array.description: In the seemingly dark deep sea, a small, dazzling light gently ripples.

Array.name: A Bountiful Day of Rabbits
Array.description: Pleasant breezes, the smell of delicious rice cakes, and warm sunshine fill today with abundance.

Array.name: A Relaxing Day of Fairies
Array.description: Chirping voices, a clear sky, and soft smiles make today a cozy and relaxed day.

Array.name: Sound of Soul in Sheet Music
Array.description: The magic of music unfolds on paper! Notes dance freely at the composer’s fingertips.

Array.name: Train Journey With the Wind
Array.description: Embracing the freedom and excitement carried by the breeze, embarking on a romantic journey to a wider world.

Array.name: Forest Full of Fireflies
Array.description: Being in the forest lit by fireflies at night will make you feel like stepping into a fairy tale.

Array.name: Sending Warm Hearts
Array.description: I’m about to deliver this heartfelt message filled with love, regard, concern, and kindness!

Array.name: Trip to Underwater Palace
Array.description: It's about a story of rabbits traveling to the deep sea to cure Underwater King's illness!

Array.name: Through Mystery Rabbit Hole
Array.description: A mysterious hole a rabbit ran into... What could be hidden inside?

Array.name: Warm Romantic Winter Night
Array.description: The warm light of winter is rising from the cozy fireplace where everyone is gathered!

Array.name: Snowflake's Confession
Array.description: When the warm sunshine comes up, the snow will melt away, but this confession of love will never fade.

Array.name: Flowing Sweet Melody
Array.description: A melody as sweet as chocolate and as tart as strawberries flows all over this space

Array.name: Golden Sand and Oasis
Array.description: Toward my secret oasis hidden among the golden sand!

Array.name: Legend of Moon Kingdom
Array.description: Long ago, in a moon kingdom that shined like gold was shimmering, lived a beautiful and delicate fairy princess…

Array.name: Bustling Cafe Street
Array.description: The bustling streets, excited footsteps, you can feel the daily hustle and bustle

Array.name: At the End of a Long Journey
Array.description: Let's fully enjoy the first day of our journey with sweet and delicious brunch!

Array.name: A Moment of a Warm Evening
Array.description: On a warm evening where kindness flows through the breeze, let’s enjoy a romantic party with our loved ones.

Array.name: Love Chocolate Factory
Array.description: The sweet Love Chocolate Factory has opened its doors for a special day!

Array.name: The Time of Blossoming Art
Array.description: Daily blossoming artistic inspiration will enrich the hearts of those who see it.

Array.name: Starlight Exploration Start
Array.description: This is a starlight maintenance station to firmly support the dream of reaching out to space!

Array.name: The Mysterious Land of Fairies
Array.description: In the mysterious land of fairies where the songs of the beautiful forest resonate, amazing things will unfold the moment you step in!

Array.name: Starlight Moonlight Sparkling Observatory
Array.description: The path to step forward towards the vast universe that holds infinite possibilities

Array.name: Wandering Market of Desert
Array.description: A place where people and things gather, vibrant lights are coloring the desert night in blue!

Array.name: Library Where Wisdom Resides
Array.description: The library of the royal palace scribe, where all the records of the world are collected. I want to gain the wisdom I need through contemplation and reflection.
